Class Animator

java.lang.Object
main.java.org.rabbittownsoftware.janimation.Animator
public class Animator extends Object
Handles frame-based animation timing and rendering for Animatable objects.

  • Method Details

    • animate

      public void animate(BufferedImage[] animationFrames, boolean shouldLoop, Animatable animatable, Graphics2D graphics2D, float offsetX, float offsetY, int size)
      Animates an Animatable by rendering its current frame.
      Parameters:
      animationFrames - Frames for the current animation.
      shouldLoop - Whether to loop or stop at the last frame.
      animatable - The object being animated.
      graphics2D - Graphics2D context.
      offsetX - X offset (world or camera).
      offsetY - Y offset (world or camera).
      size - Size (in pixels) to render frame at.

    • setFrameDuration

      public void setFrameDuration(long duration)
      Sets frame duration in milliseconds.
